recipe.title: Avocado, Kale, Pineapple, and Coconut Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup coconut water or iced green tea
instructions: Using smoothie or ice crush setting, purée avocado, kale, pineapple, coconut meat, coconut water, lemon juice, matcha, agave, salt, and 1/2 cup ice in a blender until smooth.
